localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: RevOps Deal Studio lets you easily build the perfect sales agreement templates with our block editor and end the hassle of copying and pasting from one agreement to the next. To help you get started, check out our gallery of pre-made templates.
blogPost.body: RevOps Deal Studio lets you easily build the perfect sales agreement templates with our block editor and end the hassle of copying and pasting from one agreement to the next. To help you get started, check out our gallery of pre-made templates.
blogPost.title: RevOps Deal Studio - Building blocks for better sales agreements
blogPost.author: Chris Corcoran

localize.description: RevOps Deal Studio可以让您使用我们的模块编辑器轻松建立完美的销售协议模板，并结束了从一个协议到另一个协议的复制和粘贴的麻烦。为了帮助您入门，请查看我们的预制模板库。
RevOps Deal Studio可以讓您使用我們的模塊編輯器輕鬆建立完美的銷售協議模板，並結束了從一個協議到另一個協議的複製和粘貼的麻煩。爲了幫助您入門，請查看我們的預製模板庫。

previous.title:
There used to be a TV channel whose only purpose was to show what was on all the other channels. 

Still no flying cars, but we’ve come a long way.

localize.full_text:
以前有一个电视频道 它的唯一目的就是播放其他所有频道的节目。

仍然没有飞车，但我们已经走了很长的路。

以前有一個電視頻道 它的唯一目的就是播放其他所有頻道的節目。

仍然沒有飛車，但我們已經走了很長的路。

next.excerpt: Collaborate without burnout. Replace back-to-back meetings with voice messaging groups. No calendars, no video chats, just back and forth voice messaging groups. Meet on your own time and take back your calendar.
next.title: Yac Meet - Create and share async meeting links

localize.description: 协作无倦怠。用语音消息组取代背靠背的会议。没有日历，没有视频聊天，只有来回的语音消息组。在您自己的时间开会，收回您的日历。
localize.tagline: 创建和共享异步会议链接

localize.description: 協作無倦怠。用語音消息組取代背靠背的會議。沒有日曆，沒有視頻聊天，只有來回的語音消息組。在您自己的時間開會，收回您的日曆。
localize.tagline: 創建和共享異步會議鏈接
